full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RDO RJE SDER MO'I GZUNGS MDO DANG 'BREL ZHING YI DAM BSRUNG MA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI SGO NAS PHYIR BZLOG BYA TSUL PHAS RGOL 'JOMS PA'I RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES RDO RJE SDER MO'I GZUNGS MDO @009A *, ,DANG 'BREL ZHING YI DAM BSRUNG MA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI SGO NAS PHYIR BZLOG BYED TSUL PHAS RGOL 'JOMS PA'I RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, HAL HA GA-YON RU'I PHYOGS TA'I CHEN DZA SAG MGON DKAR SKYABS KYIS BLA MA MKHYEN PA'I DPYOD LDAN AA CHI THU BLO BZANG BTZUN 'GRUS DANG, DAD LDAN AU DZING THAS JI 'CHI MED RNAMS GNYIS KYIS BSKUL ZHING, LHAG PAR BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG MI RJE DAM PA AER TE NI AA HAS DZA SAG RNAM RGYAL RDO RJE'I RIM 'GROR NYER MKHO'I BSKUL MA BYUNG ZHING, 'DI 'DRA'I LAG LEN YON MED MTHONG THOS SU MA GYUR CING, GDUGS DKAR GYI GZUNGS MDO'I SGO NAS ZLOG BSGYUR BYED TSUL YIG RNYING DANG GSER BRTZOM MANG DU BZHUGS PA DE BZHIN, 'DIR YANG DE'I RIG 'DRA'I SBYOR RUNG NGAM SNYAMS, 'ON KYANG GZUNGS MDO KHO NA LA BSTEN NAS BYAR RUNG MI RUNG THE TSOM MCHIS KYANG, RANG GI YI DAM CHOS SKYONG GI 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SGO NAS GZUNGS MDO DANG BSTUN PA'I RIG 'DRA'I SBYOR RUNG SEMS SHING, MO PHYVA MKHAN GYI LUNG BSTAN DU 'KHRUL BA'I DON GNYER CAN MANG DU MCHIS KYANG LAG LEN RNAMS DAG BYED MKHAN SU YANG MA MTHONG, 'JAM DPAL RDO RJES MDZAD CES KHA GA-YAR BA'I RDO RJE SDER MO'I ZLOG BSGYUR DU GRAGS PA DE NI MDOS GLUD KYI NGAG 'DON LA BZLOG TSIG KHUNG MED SNA TSOGS SHIG BRIS 'DUG PA MDOS GTOR KYI RNAM DBYE MI SHES PA'I RANG BZHIN LAS MA 'DAS PAS, ,GZUNGS MDO RANG GI GZHUNG DON DANG MTHUN CING DPYAD BZOD PA'I KHUL DU BYAS TE RANG GZHAN LA PHAN SEMS KYIS KUN NAS BLANGS TE AA CHI THU AER TE NI MER KIN MKHAN PO CHOS RJE SNGAGS 'CHANG DGE 'DUN SENGGE CES MING DON BRAL GYI NA BAS SDEBS PA'O, ,)
